title: [A Design for leisure]
creator_credit: Richard Graham and Australia. Dept. of Tourism
brief_description: Melbourne architect, Mr Jack Clarke, discusses the need for recreation facilities to be done so that not only will the centre provide the recreation activities required by the community but it would attract all sections of the community. Focuses on architectural style and design.
